Browse Q&A My Q&A Profile Connections Help All > Business > Management and HR Jessie asked How Much do Restaurant Managers Make? Topics: restaurant owner Share:
Answers verylate: There are so many types of restaurants that managers can work in, that it makes it hard to pin down an average figure. I know that you will work hard, long hours for whatever you earn. There are starting positions that will pay a restaurant manager as little as $24,000.00 per year. There are jobs for experienced managers that might pay as much as $100,000.00 per year. Posted 1 year ago Was this helpful? 2 0 Related Questions How Much Do Hotel Managers Make?
